name: ROSA HCP Cluster Provisioning
description: Provision a ROSA HCP cluster with automated network and role configuration

playbooks.name: Create ROSA HCP Cluster
playbooks.description: Provisions a ROSA HCP cluster with optional ROSANetwork and ROSARoleConfig automation

documentation.overview: This test suite provisions ROSA HCP clusters using the enhanced create_rosa_hcp_cluster.yml playbook with support for automated network and IAM role creation.
prerequisites: MCE/ACM hub cluster with CAPI/CAPA configured

ROSANetwork.description: Automatically creates VPC, subnets, and networking resources via CloudFormation

ROSARoleConfig.description: Automatically creates AWS IAM roles (installer, support, worker) and OIDC provider

configuration.role_prefix: Prefix for IAM role names (defaults to cluster name)

customization.cluster_name: Name of the cluster (auto-generated random name by default)
customization.domain_prefix: Domain prefix for cluster API URL (required, max 15 chars)
customization.openshift_version: OpenShift version to deploy (default: 4.20.10, latest stable ROSA HCP)
customization.channel_group: Update channel: stable, fast, or candidate (default: stable)

expected_results: ROSANetwork resource created (if enabled) with CloudFormation stack
ROSARoleConfig resource created (if enabled) with IAM roles and OIDC
